class.name: SQLite3Blob
class.description: This class wraps the sqlite3_blob* handle and provides methods for incremental reading and writing of large binary objects (BLOBs) in the database.

method.name: reopen
method.description: Moves the blob handle to a different row of the same table. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: read
method.description: Reads up to n bytes from the blob starting at the specified offset. Returns the data as a byte array.

method.name: write
method.description: Writes the contents of the buffer to the blob starting at the specified offset. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.

method.name: bytes
method.description: Returns the size of the blob in bytes.

method.name: close
method.description: Closes the blob handle. Returns [code]SQLITE_OK[/code] on success.
